attributes.action: Make child sex offenders and abusers to get tougher sentences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am heartbroken at how the children of today are not protected in anyway against sex offences and abuse. it is disgusting that the offender has the chance to defend themselves when there is no humaine reason as to why they have commited the crime. its all very well saying human rights and all that but what human raghts do those children have that are abused!!!!! they should not even be given a trial of any sort just sent straight to prison for life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
